fetchCarouselFail.title: Database error
fetchCarouselFail.content: Chosen carousel informations can't be found in the database.

newCarouselClickWarning.title: Carousel has been modified
newCarouselClickWarning.content: You have unsaved modifications on this carousel. Would you like to discard them and proceed ?

backToSelectionClickWarning.title: Carousel has been modified
backToSelectionClickWarning.content: You have unsaved modifications on this carousel. Would you like to discard them and proceed ?

deleteSuccess.title: Deletion successful
deleteSuccess.content: The carousel has been deleted from the database.

carouselSelectedWarning.title: Carousel has been modified
carouselSelectedWarning.content: You have unsaved modifications on this carousel. Would you like to discard them and proceed ?

createCarouselDuplicate.title: Duplicate carousel
createCarouselDuplicate.content: A carousel with this name is already present in the database.

createCarouselSuccess.title: Carousel created
createCarouselSuccess.content: has been created in the database.

createCarouselDbFail.title: Database error
createCarouselDbFail.content: Error during database writing: the new carousel could not be saved.

handleCreateCarouselNoTitle.title: Creation error
handleCreateCarouselNoTitle.content: You must choose a name for the new carousel.

handleCreateCarouselTooMuchVideos.title: Too much videos
handleCreateCarouselTooMuchVideos.content: Number of videos assigned to a carousel can't exceed 10. Please modify video assignment.

handleDeletionWarning.title: Deletion warning
handleDeletionWarning.content: You are about to delete this carousel permanently. Do you want to continue ?
